snippet: The Interior Ministry said security agencies had arrested a number of Islamic State militants, foiling plots that included a plan to blow up a Shiite mosque....
lead_paragraph: The Interior Ministry said security agencies had arrested a number of Islamic State militants, foiling plots that included a plan to blow up a Shiite mosque.

headline.main: Kuwait Says It Thwarted 3 Planned ISIS Attacks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
